attributes.action: Hold a parliamentary vote on membership of the EU before invoking article 50
attributes.additional_details:
This is an article regarding the issue, it shows over a 1000 barristers, including 100 members of the queens council (QCs) including Professor Sir Geoffrey Nice, having signed a letter to the PM to the same effect as this petition.

https://apple.news/ACOqr7sp9Tl6Dhiy9o66_pg
attributes.background: This petition is not about being for, or against, EU membership. This petition seeks to encourage our government to enact the proper, legal and governmental system. Citizens entrust MPs to make such decisions, in an educated manner, on their behalf. A referendum outcome is advisatory, not binding.
